mapper.sql: coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_money, coupon_des, coupon_send_num, coupon_receive_num, coupon_send_start_time, coupon_send_end_time, coupon_valid_start_time, coupon_valid_end_time, coupon_create_time, coupon_flag
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from t_coupons
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into t_coupons (coupon_id, coupon_name, coupon_type, coupon_money, coupon_des, coupon_send_num, coupon_receive_num, coupon_send_start_time, coupon_send_end_time, coupon_valid_start_time, coupon_valid_end_time, coupon_create_time, coupon_flag) values (#{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponSendNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponReceiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{couponSendStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponSendEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponValidStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponValidEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{couponFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update t_coupons
coupon_id = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_name = #{record.couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_type = #{record.couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_money = #{record.couponMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},

coupon_receive_num = #{record.couponReceiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},

coupon_send_end_time = #{record.couponSendEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coupon_valid_start_time = #{record.couponValidStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

coupon_create_time = #{record.couponCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coupon_flag = #{record.couponFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_coupons set coupon_id = #{record.couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_name = #{record.couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_type = #{record.couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_money = #{record.couponMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_des = #{record.couponDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_send_num = #{record.couponSendNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_receive_num = #{record.couponReceiveNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, coupon_send_start_time = #{record.couponSendStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_send_end_time = #{record.couponSendEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_valid_start_time = #{record.couponValidStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_valid_end_time = #{record.couponValidEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_create_time = #{record.couponCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, coupon_flag = #{record.couponFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_coupons
coupon_name = #{couponName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_type = #{couponType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
coupon_money = #{couponMoney,jdbcType=INTEGER},
coupon_des = #{couponDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

coupon_create_time = #{couponCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
coupon_flag = #{couponFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where coupon_id = #{couponId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
